personal.name: Najiullah Rao
personal.title: Full Stack Engineer
personal.tagline: Building scalable web apps & seamless digital experiences
personal.bio: Versatile Software Developer with expertise in modern front-end and back-end technologies. Skilled in building scalable, high-performance web and mobile applications using JavaScript and TypeScript. Passionate about problem-solving and staying updated with emerging technologies.

experience.description: Working on full-stack web applications, implementing authentication, payment systems, and scalable backend APIs.
achievements: Integrated Stripe one-time payment flow in Next.js apps
Built dashboard UI with CRUD functionality for multiple apps
Worked on OAuth client integration for Bluesky (atproto)

experience.description: Developed various personal and freelance projects focusing on modern web technologies.
achievements: Developed multiple Next.js apps including WeatherDesk & Bluesky Downloader
Created PocketTrack, an expense tracker mobile app using React Native

projects.title: WeatherDesk
projects.description: A weather dashboard app with real-time forecasts, subscription-based premium features, and Stripe payment integration.

projects.title: Task Manager with Timer & Billing
projects.description: A feature-rich task management app built with Next.js, including timers, billing toggles, and Firebase authentication.

projects.title: Fiverr Clone
projects.description: A full-stack Fiverr-like platform built with PostgreSQL and modern web technologies.

projects.title: PocketTrack
projects.description: An expense tracker mobile app built with React Native & Expo.
